body: 苦主真的是个铁废物，被揍成这样

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me (i accidentally read this comment, so sorry
lol rip this guy, if you can't beat em, join em
至少让黑人有一个姐姐，白人让她低头  at least make the black guy have a sister and the white guy fuckes  her

So, yeah - he obviously can't beat the guy fairly, and the black dude will obviously fuck with him till the end of time...
Time for some street justice, then. Time to find a bunch of Japanese thugs that hate black men (can't be that hard, really), or just wait for him, one night, and stab him in the back.
No reason, at this point, to be nice about it. But hey - do NOT expect this to actually happen in this dousing,  since there's no way terasu will let this kid out of his constant misery.
This is why you should never take netorate seriously - ITRW, people just do not take this level of shit without brutal retribution afterwards.
Finally he can get revenge the table will finally bend
Fuck mc that black dude straight up the goat
雖然知道只是為了情節表現，但女主柔道爛成這樣還是看了頭很痛
Dunno if i can call him mc
